definition: to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess
to provoke/to irritate/to vex/to stir up/to anger/to attract (troubles)/to cause (problems)

sentences.english: This child is always making trouble for his parents.
sentences.chinese: 這孩子老給父母招災惹禍。
